quizzes.question: Which two tags below make the text bold?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Formatting Elements[/h1] In HTML, there is a list of elements that specify text style. Formatting elements were designed to display special types of text: [code format="html" codeId="9"] first page

This is regular text

[b] [/b]bold text [b][/b]

[b] [/b]big text [b][/b]

[b] [/b]italic text [b][/b]

[b] [/b]small text [b][/b]

[b] [/b]strong text [b][/b]

[b] [/b]subscripted text [b][/b]

[b] [/b]superscripted text [b][/b]

[b] [/b]inserted text [b][/b]

[b] [/b]deleted text [b][/b]

[/code]

[h1]Formatting Elements[/h1]

Each paragraph in the example is formatted differently to demonstrate what each tag does:  [img id="2531" width="100%"]
[note]Browsers display <strong> as <b>, and <em> as <i>.
However, the meanings of these tags differ: <b> and <i> define bold and italic text, respectively, while <strong> and <em> indicate that the text is "[b]important[/b]".[/note]
